item.title: Setting up the all servers needed for PXE
item.description: We are going to use dnsmasq package to supply DHCP and TFTP functionality to your PXE server. Install and configure dnsmasq sudo pacman --quiet --noconfirm -S dnsmasq sudo cp -rp /etc/dnsmasq.conf /etc/dnsmasq.conf_$(date "+%Y%m%d") sudo sh -c "cat > /etc/dnsmasq.conf <<EOF port=0 interface=eth0 bind-interfaces dhcp-range=192.168.10.50,192.168.10.60,12h dhcp-boot=/arch/boot/syslinux/lpxelinux.0 dhcp-option-force=209,boot/syslinux/archiso.cfg dhcp-option-force=210,/arch/ dhcp-option-force=66,192.168.10.102 enable-tftp tftp-root=/srv/pxe EOF" resolving dependencies... looking for conflicting packages...
